Athletics New Zealand


Athletics New Zealand - Results and Rankings

HOME - displays latest site statistics, news items, recent NZ records, athlete birthdays, today in history and year's performance leaders.

SEARCH LISTS - search by current year or all-time lists, all events, genders and age groups.

RECENT RESULTS - displays full lists of performances over the past 3, 7 or 14 days.

ATHLETE SEARCH - search for over 3,500 athlete profiles on the database.

RESULT LISTINGS - displays full listings for each event and age category with expanded toggle for hidden details.

ATHLETE PROFILES - shows both mini and full profiles for each athlete including NZ representaion, medals won and annual progressions.

Previous Next

Scope:

Design and build an online rankings and results database to replace the existing paper based PDF/word doc lists which were updated on an irregular basis. Client also required a facility to view full athlete profiles showing personal bests performances, yearly progressions, national representation and medals won at national championships.

Responsive:

The Athletics New Zealand Rankings site is primarily made up of multi-column tabluar data which required a solution to work effectively on smaller devices, especially phones. By initailly hiding the less important columns and then allowing the user to click and display the remaining information (vertically), we achieved a seamless cross-over between large and smaller formats.

Technologies used:

HTML5, CSS3 (Bootstrap), jQuery, PHP (Codeigniter framework), MySql database.
